definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: The teacher teaches us to practice horse-riding steps in PE class.
sentences.chinese: 體育課上，老師教我們蹲馬步。
